snippet: The attorney general said European countries should try to prevent potential terrorists from traveling to Syria to fight in the war there.
abstract: Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr implores more European countries to adopt American-style counterterrorism laws and tactics, including undercover stings to prevent potential terrorist from traveling to Syria.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general said European countries should try to prevent potential terrorists from traveling to Syria to fight in the war there.

headline.main: Holder Urges Europeans to Step Up Antiterrorism Tactics
headline.print_headline: Holder Urges Nations to Adopt U.S. Tactics on Terror
